name: Home Delivered Groceries (HDG) program
description: 100 low-income households receive grocery bags weekly. Each grocery bag contains eighteen pounds of nutrition: melons, eggplant, rolled oats, milk, eggs, healthy fruits, and vegetables.
fullDescription: 100 low-income households receive grocery bags weekly. Each grocery bag contains eighteen pounds of nutrition: melons, eggplant, rolled oats, milk, eggs, healthy fruits, and vegetables.
whatTheyOffer: 100 low-income households receive grocery bags weekly. Each grocery bag contains eighteen pounds of nutrition: melons, eggplant, rolled oats, milk, eggs, healthy fruits, and vegetables.
agency: The Russian American Community Services Association of SF, Inc.
